Triggers a global alert upon completion

civilopediaText.text: This project enables the construction and maintenance of deadly orbital installations, capable of firing devasting shots to virtually any location on Io.

name: Space Elevator
uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [Space] units [in all cities]
quote: This towering structure allows for cheap and rapid deployment of satellites, giving a notable advantage to the company that constructs it.

civilopediaText.text: This towering structure allows for cheap and rapid deployment of satellites, giving a notable advantage to the company that constructs it.

name: Field-Repair Nanosystem
uniques: May heal outside of friendly territory
quote: By equipping our units with versatile systems based on universal assemblers, we can enable them to rapidly repair and upgrade themselves using only the supplies available to them in the field.

civilopediaText.text: By equipping our units with versatile systems based on universal assemblers, we can enable them to rapidly repair and upgrade themselves using only the supplies available to them in the field.
